scripts.deploy-kovan: graph deploy marlinprotocol/staking-kovan subgraph-kovan.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-local-kovan: graph deploy marlinprotocol/staking-kovan subgraph-kovan.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-dev: graph deploy marlinprotocol/staking-dev subgraph-dev.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-local-dev: graph deploy marlinprotocol/staking-dev subgraph-dev.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
